curam.util.resources

Class XMLParserConstants

  • java.lang.Object
    • curam.util.resources.XMLParserConstants

  • public final class XMLParserConstants
extends java.lang.Object
    A class containing common configuration constants for XML parsers.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String kDisallowInlineDTDProperty
      XXE Prevention - Parser configuration property to disallow all DTD's.

      XXE Prevention - Parser configuration property for External Entities.
      static java.lang.String kLoadExternalDTDProperty
      XXE Prevention - Parser configuration property for external DTD's.
      static java.lang.String kParamEntitiesProperty
      XXE Prevention - Parser configuration property for Parameter entities.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Field Detail

      • kDisallowInlineDTDProperty

        public static final java.lang.String kDisallowInlineDTDProperty
        XXE Prevention - Parser configuration property to disallow all DTD's. Provides highest Level of Security but may cause side-effects in higher stacks so we set to false. It set to false by default, but we have included it here to explicitly illustrate the full parser configuration.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • kExternalEntitiesProperty

        public static final java.lang.String kExternalEntitiesProperty
        XXE Prevention - Parser configuration property for External Entities.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • kParamEntitiesProperty

        public static final java.lang.String kParamEntitiesProperty
        XXE Prevention - Parser configuration property for Parameter entities.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • kLoadExternalDTDProperty

        public static final java.lang.String kLoadExternalDTDProperty
        XXE Prevention - Parser configuration property for external DTD's.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
